mapper.select: SELECT C.BOARD_COMMENT_ID, C.BOARD_COMMENT_USER_ID, C.BOARD_COMMENT_OWNER_ID, C.BOARD_COMMENT_OWNER_ID, C.BOARD_COMMENT_PARENT_COMMENT_ID, C.BOARD_COMMENT_CONTENTS, C.BOARD_COMMENT_YN, C.BOARD_COMMENT_CREATED, U.USER_NM, O.OWNER_NM FROM TB_BOARD_COMMENT C LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_USER U ON C.BOARD_COMMENT_USER_ID = U.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OWNER O ON C.BOARD_COMMENT_OWNER_ID = O.OWNER_ID WHERE C.BOARD_COMMENT_BOARD_ID = #{boardCommentBoardId} ORDER BY C.BOARD_COMMENT_PARENT_COMMENT_ID ASC, C.BOARD_COMMENT_ID ASC

SELECT BOARD_COMMENT_ID, BOARD_COMMENT_USER_ID, BOARD_COMMENT_OWNER_ID, BOARD_COMMENT_OWNER_ID, BOARD_COMMENT_CONTENTS, BOARD_COMMENT_YN, BOARD_COMMENT_CREATED FROM TB_BOARD_COMMENT WHERE BOARD_COMMENT_ID = #{boardCommentId}

SELECT BOARD_COMMENT_ID, BOARD_COMMENT_USER_ID, BOARD_COMMENT_OWNER_ID, BOARD_COMMENT_OWNER_ID, BOARD_COMMENT_CONTENTS, BOARD_COMMENT_YN, BOARD_COMMENT_CREATED FROM TB_BOARD_COMMENT WHERE BOARD_COMMENT_PARENT_COMMENT_ID = #{boardCommentParentCommentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD_COMMENT ( BOARD_COMMENT_ID, BOARD_COMMENT_BOARD_ID, BOARD_COMMENT_USER_ID, BOARD_COMMENT_OWNER_ID, BOARD_COMMENT_PARENT_COMMENT_ID, BOARD_COMMENT_CONTENTS, BOARD_COMMENT_YN, BOARD_COMMENT_CREATED ) VALUES ( #{boardCommentId}, #{boardCommentBoardId}, #{boardCommentUserId}, #{boardCommentOwnerId}, #{boardCommentParentCommentId}, #{boardCommentContents}, #{boardCommentYn}, NOW() )
